title: TikTok's Lawsuit Over Trump Ban
itunes:title: TikTok's Lawsuit Over Trump Ban
description:
James Dempsey, executive director of the Berkeley Center for Law and Technology at the University of California, Berkeley, discusses TikTok filing a lawsuit to block the Trump administration from enacting a ban on the fast-growing social media network, as it negotiates a sale of its U.S. assets. June Grasso hosts.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
